post.text: "No major party nominee in the history of the United States of America...has known less or been less prepared to deal with our national security than Donald J. Trump. And what absolutely amazes me is that he doesn't seem to want to learn it." â€”Joe Biden on Donald Trump

comment.author: Ryan
comment.text: Less prepared than Obama who had never led anything or Hillary who after all these years as an insider still loves to plead ignorance

replies.author: Jessica
replies.text: When a guy like Trump asks the former head of Fox to work on his team. When the same head of Fox has just been fired for trying to lure Fox employees to bed and harassing them sexually. When men like Guiliani and Gingrich, known for their womanizing and divorces are also Trump spokes persons, then I'd say those men are not respectful of women, especially one like Hillary.

replies.author: Ryan
replies.text: Respect must be earned whether a man or a woman , is a woman who protects her husband from sexual assault accusations any better , And by the way what policies has she laid out that will make a difference, what about a campaign staffer who lost her job as head of the DNC because of insensitive racist and antisemitic comments in emails , what about a candidate who brings ILLEGAL ALIENS on stage at her convention I m not even going to take time to lay out the 20 minutes worth of ineptitude laid out by the Director of The FBI. Whose morals should we be concerned with?
